paragraphs.text: Jarsking covers all cosmetics，cannabis and perfume markets. Ask custom solutions here!
For Brands: Contract Manufacturing
For Filling Factories: Sourcing
For Traders: Purchasing Plans
For Influencers: Co-Design + Production
For Design Studios: Brand Consultancy
The world’s go-to cosmetic packaging factory for custom branding. Talk to Jarsking Team
To make cosmetic packaging better, easier for brands. I Need Solution

Discover our airtight glass storage jar is made of high quality glass material with a child-resistant sealing cap and visual window, ensuring durability and longevity. It is odor proof and waterproof, protect your flower inside fresh for longer periods of time.

Product Name: Premium Glass Storage Container with Visual WindowCapacity: 1oz, 2oz, 3oz, 4oz bottlesColor: CustomizedMaterial: Glass Bottle and Plastic CapUse: Smell Proof Airtight Containers for Herbs, Spices, Coffee, Teas & MoreMOQ: 10000PCS
Delivery Packing: Standard export carton packing
Surface Treatment: Silk screen, frosting, electroplating, color coating, 3D printing, hot stamping
Packaging Suggestion:

A cannabis producer partnered with Jarsking to elevate their flower product line using vibrant pastel-colored coating glass jars with child-resistant caps. Each distinctive hue—including mint green, soft yellow, blush pink, baby blue, and peach—was strategically assigned to specific strains, enabling consumers to easily identify their favorite products at a glance.

The jars provided an airtight, smell-proof seal, preserving the flower’s freshness and aroma while maintaining compliance with safety regulations through child-resistant closures. These innovative containers featured bold, customizable designs that reinforced branding while standing out on dispensary shelves.

This collaboration demonstrates how color-coded packaging systems enhance both product identification and brand appeal. By choosing these premium glass jars, the cannabis producer successfully blended luxury, safety, and creativity, solidifying their position as a forward-thinking brand in the competitive cannabis market.

items: Stash Jars Multipurpose Airtight Glass Storage Jar
Smell-Proof & Airtight – Keeps contents fresh, odor-free, and moisture-protected.
Child-Resistant Cap – Certified safety design for secure cannabis or herb storage.
Thick Premium Glass – Crystal-clear visibility with scratch-resistant heavy glass base.
Multipurpose Use – Ideal for coffee, spices, teas, and cannabis storage.
